title: Historic bell set to ring again at 172-year-old church in Secunderabad

title: Mustafizur IPL controversy: Kaif advocates patience; says decision lies with BCCI
description: Mohammad Kaif has urged restraint amid the controversy over Mustafizur Rahman’s IPL association with KKR, calling for a “wait and watch” approach and leaving the decision to the BCCI. His comments come as political and religious reactions intensify following attacks on Hindus in Bangladesh and criticism of Shah Rukh Khan over the signing.

title: FBI says it disrupted a potential New Year’s Eve attack inspired by Islamic State group
description: Christian Sturdivant, 18, was charged with attempting to provide material support to a foreign terror organization after officials say he communicated his attack plans to an undercover FBI employee

title: Close call: Plane with 55 onboard skids off runway in Nepal; video shows damaged aircraft
description: A Buddha Air aircraft overshot the runway while landing at Nepal's Bhadrapur Airport on Friday night, with all 51 passengers and four crew members escaping uninjured. The plane skidded off the airstrip by nearly 200 meters, coming to a halt in a grassy area with minor damage. A technical team has been dispatched to assess the aircraft.

title: The world is huge, right? It’s not just a chessboard and pieces: Hou Yifan
description: As a child prodigy, a dominant World champion and a university professor, Hou has lived many lives — and she is just 31. Still the top-ranked woman, she intends to study neuroscience to understand the connection between the brain and chess patterns. She opens up in this conversation about her unique relationship with the game

title: Xabi Alonso’s pivotal week in the Real Madrid hot seat
description: Managerial life in the Spanish capital can be challenging when the results dry up, as Alonso is discovering. Despite a promising beginning, a form slump has led to the 44-year-old dealing with boardroom drama, superstar egos and fickle fan sentiment. Given club president Florentino Perez’s impatience with managers, Alonso’s future hinges on how his side starts the new year

title: 'Know where to aim': Iran warns Trump over threat; violent protests rock Tehran

Iran's armed forces are on standby, vowing to forcefully reject any external involvement in their internal affairs.

Trailing Australia 3-1, England will look to end the series on a positive note in the final Test at Sydney.

He emphasizes that teaching quality, practical experience, overall cost, and the host country's economic prospects are paramount.  These factors, he argues, are more critical for genuine learning and future career success than mere prestige.

The population has fallen for three consecutive years, with experts warning of continued decline.

The blaze at Le Constellation killed at least 40 people and injured more than 100, with videos showing panic as exits were blocked by the spreading fire.

title: T20 WC: No Rickelton and Stubbs! South Africa announces squad
description: South Africa named their T20 World Cup squad with new faces Kwena Maphaka and Jason Smith, while dropping Ryan Rickelton and Tristan Stubbs. Smith earned selection due to strong recent form. Kagiso Rabada and Anrich Nortje return to the side. Placed in Group D, South Africa begin their campaign against Canada on February 9 in Ahmedabad.

title: Bird flu outbreak in India: Early symptoms, preventive tips to know
description: The symptoms become severe enough to cause serious breathing problems, which indicate that the lungs have become affected during days 3-5. The patient experiences breathing difficulties which occur during rest periods, and the chest area experiences severe pain when the person attempts to cough, or take deep breaths while his sputum production becomes both thick and bloody

title: Carlos & Francis Mendoza net worth: Mets manager salary, earnings and lifestyle
description: Carlos Mendoza, a Venezuelan baseball star, rose from the minor leagues to manage the New York Mets. His wife, Francis Mendoza, a former dentist, sacrificed her career to support his journey. The couple, blessed with two sons, values family and companionship. Mendoza's earnings stem solely from his baseball career, making him a notable Venezuelan figure in Major League Baseball management.

He said the trio deserved greater respect for their contributions and compared India’s approach with England, where legends like Stuart Broad and James Anderson received memorable farewells.

title: 'Unable to speak': Faridabad gang rape survivor battles fractures; kids ‘terrified’
description: A 25-year-old Faridabad woman, severely injured and traumatized after being raped and assaulted, is unable to give her statement to police. She sustained multiple facial fractures and requires surgery. Two drivers have been arrested in connection with the brutal incident.

description: India is set for a sharp hiring uptick in 2026, with employers expected to add up to 12 million jobs, according to TeamLease. Yet the surge may not benefit everyone equally. As companies hire selectively, prioritising skills, adaptability and diversity, the gap between job creation and workforce readiness could become more visible than ever.

title: 'The end of me': Google's Eric Schmidt on AI; says 55 years of coding wiped out
description: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt believes AI's rapid advancement, already handling 10-20% of programming tasks, signals the end of traditional coding careers. He sees AI's true economic power in automating corporate functions like billing and accounting, not just coding. Schmidt also predicts Artificial General Intelligence by 2029, urging human oversight to preserve agency.

This assault follows other violent incidents targeting the Hindu community in Bangladesh.

Brittany Mahomes shares New Year glimpse as Patrick Mahomes grinds through rehab
description: Patrick Mahomes is entering 2026 focused entirely on rehab after suffering ACL and LCL tears late in the season. A New Year post from Brittany Mahomes confirmed he is still on crutches, reinforcing the long road ahead. Andy Reid stressed patience, noting Mahomes remains around the team while prioritizing recovery over travel or timelines.

title: York family net worth: How a $13 million bet became the 49ers’ $8.4 billion empire
description: Forbes ranks San Francisco 49ers owner Denise DeBartolo York and her family at $8.4 Billion, placing them ahead of Donald Trump and Mark Cuban. The York family controls over 90% of the 49ers, now valued above $8 Billion, after decades of growth tied to NFL success and global sports investments, according to Forbes 2025 rankings released in September this year.

title: Paulina Gretzky net worth 2025: Inside Wayne Gretzky’s daughter’s wealth
description: The daughter of a legendary hockey player, Wayne Gretzky, and a wife to a pro golf player, Dustin Johnson, Paulina Gretzky has established her own way in the industry of entertainment and social media. Having a net worth of five million dollars, she has been successful in business, modeling, and acting. It has also been reported that she will inherit a large portion of her father's fortune.

title: Tesla's former AI boss: Google Waymo cannot match Tesla's self-driving tech
description: Former Tesla AI chief Andrej Karpathy believes Google's Waymo couldn't replicate Tesla's recent coast-to-coast autonomous drive. He highlighted Tesla's end-to-end neural network versus Waymo's modular system, which struggled during a San Francisco power outage. Karpathy praised the milestone despite recent criticism from Elon Musk about his "dated" views.

title: Fans hail Ayesha Curry’s 'A+ wife move' as gesture for Stephen Curry goes viral
description: Ayesha Curry recently garnered widespread praise from fans for wearing her husband Stephen Curry's Davidson jersey during a visit to his alma mater. This heartwarming gesture, seen during a tribute to the NBA star, effectively silenced recent marriage rumors. Fans lauded her unwavering support and loyalty, highlighting the couple's strong bond.

title: Caitlin Clark & Connor McCaffery 2025 net worth: Earnings & endorsements
description: Caitlin Clark and Connor McCaffery, a power couple in the sports world, boast a combined net worth of $11.5 million. Clark, a WNBA star, has secured lucrative endorsements alongside her rookie contract. McCaffery, a rising basketball coach, is building his career after playing multiple sports in college. Their individual successes contribute to their impressive financial standing.
